title: For a better ruqqus experience which ruqqus members should I follow? Which guilds should I join?

body: Follow me.
body_html: Follow me.

guild.description:
Ask and answer questions.

Rules:

🤔 Posts must be questions. This is a community dedicated to Q&A discussion, so post titles must be in the form of a question.

⁉️ No loaded questions.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

🥾 Breaking these rules will result in posts being kicked and possibly an exile.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

post.title: For a better ruqqus experience which ruqqus members should I follow? Which guilds should I join?

author.bio: Just a reddit rufugee looking for some OC and common interests without being "well, actually'd" to death.  Otherwise just an average American working for a living (sorta) and trying to make it.
author.bio_html: Just a reddit rufugee looking for some OC and common interests without being "well, actually'd" to death.  Otherwise just an average American working for a living (sorta) and trying to make it.

body:
+Oceans +GoneWild +MysteriousUniverse +Wanderlust - a few nature, exploratory guilds

+KindaCool +InterestingShit - just like they say, kinda cool and interesting shit

+Art +Photography +MiniPainting +Illustrations - for different arts

+Cooking, +Baking - be careful, they'll make you hungry and possibly fat

+Books +Coffee +Tea - three things I love anyway

+VoteWithYourWallet - random useful political guild

+Frugal - incredibly useful information here on how to save money on *everything*

+HistoryinPictures +Warshipporn - sister guilds with awesome photos and stories

Happy hunting guys!
body_html:
+Oceans +GoneWild +MysteriousUniverse +Wanderlust - a few nature, exploratory guilds

+KindaCool +InterestingShit - just like they say, kinda cool and interesting shit

+Art +Photography +Minipainting +Illustrations - for different arts

+Cooking, +Baking - be careful, they'll make you hungry and possibly fat

+Books +coffee +tea - three things I love anyway

+VoteWithYourWallet - random useful political guild

+Frugal - incredibly useful information here on how to save money on everything

+HistoryInPictures +WarshipPorn - sister guilds with awesome photos and stories

Happy hunting guys!

post.title: For a better ruqqus experience which ruqqus members should I follow? Which guilds should I join?

body:
For starters, let me repeat my comment from the other day about being very much on your side with respect to what is happening in your country. I salute the courage of those people who are rising up. 

Past that, I will shamelessly plug one of my Guilds, +RoadTripUSA. This might strike you as a bit odd, especially since there are hardly any members. Ruqqus is still new, and the Guild search mechanics could be better. If you join and are interested in learning more about the United States, I will make it my personal mission to acquaint you with America the Beautiful, from sea to shining sea.
body_html:
For starters, let me repeat my comment from the other day about being very much on your side with respect to what is happening in your country. I salute the courage of those people who are rising up.

Past that, I will shamelessly plug one of my Guilds, +RoadTripUSA. This might strike you as a bit odd, especially since there are hardly any members. Ruqqus is still new, and the Guild search mechanics could be better. If you join and are interested in learning more about the United States, I will make it my personal mission to acquaint you with America the Beautiful, from sea to shining sea.

guild.description:
Ask and answer questions.

Rules:

🤔 Posts must be questions. This is a community dedicated to Q&A discussion, so post titles must be in the form of a question.

⁉️ No loaded questions.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

🥾 Breaking these rules will result in posts being kicked and possibly an exile.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.
